title: riven is gonna be so bad vs ranged now
body:
now she wont be able to use 3 qs an e and a flash just to instagib them without those anyway


so the most annoying part of riven ( for me personally ) has been taken away, and she will now be forced to play aggresive.

im actually really liking these changes. its not like they are huge power nerfs, but they force a different playstyle and add counterplay.
